The School Dorms had just been constructed at U.A, and with everyone moving into their dorms Izuku Midoriya, otherwise known as Deku, decided to spend the rest of the evening to look for some decorations for his new home.

“Yeah. I’ve been a little busy with school…” Deku replied, timidly.

“Well! What can I get you? Here for some All-Might merch?”

Deku looked up at the shelf behind her, seeing the latest figure that had caught his attention

“Yeah! Can I get that one there?” he asked. As he pointed to the figure, the tip of his finger emitted a slight green glow. As he did, he noticed the cashier’s eyes briefly flash green, before seeming to glaze over. Her mouth went slack as she just stood there.

“U-uh… sorry about that little flash. I didn’t mean to do that... “ he replied. She did not seem to respond.

“Uhm… so can you grab the figure for me?” he inquired

“...As you wish, Master…” she replied in a monotone as she turned to grab the box from the shelf, and placed it before Deku.

“Did… you just call me Master?”

“I did, Master…” she answered.

As Deku was walking through, thinking about which of his friends to test his powers on and how to use his new power in general, he passed a house with which he was incredibly familiar. "Oh! Izuku! It's been a while since I saw you last!" she said with a smile as the young Hero stood before her. "I heard you're in Katsuki's class! He talks about you from time to time!"

"Mhm! Anyway, what are you doing here?" Mitsuki inquired

"Oh! Ka-chan asked me to grab something for him from home since I was in the area" he said with a weak smile, hoping she didn't see through his lie

"Oh? Show me. It'll be nice to at least be proud of one of the local boys for having a power that isn't just destructive" she joked.

Deku held up his finger. Mitsuki's eyes fixed on it with a smile. Then the green light radiated from his fingertip. Her eyes quickly flashed green in response before glazing over. Her lips fell from her smile to a neutral position as she stared ahead.

He'd done it! Mitsuki was under his control! The question was... what to do with her?
